meanings.definition: The quality or state of being waggish.
meanings.sent1: Her waggishnesses brought laughter to everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: His waggishnesses always lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent3: The waggishnesses of the class clown made even the strict teacher crack a smile.
meanings.sent4: The waggishnesses of the mischievous kitten brightened up the dull day.
meanings.sent5: The waggishnesses of the playful puppy were contagious, spreading joy to all.

meanings.definition: The behavior or actions of someone who is waggish.
meanings.sent1: The waggishnesses of the comedian had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but giggle at the waggishnesses of her little brother.
meanings.sent3: His waggishnesses at the party made him the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: The waggishnesses of the jester entertained the royal court for hours.
meanings.sent5: The waggishnesses of the playful otter brightened up the zoo visitors' day.
